9800.name: Ranku's Blueprint
9800.description: This is a blueprint belonging to Ranku that Matras requested.

9801.name: Demon Prince's Blueprint
9801.description: This is a blueprint belonging to a Demon Prince that Matras requested.

9802.name: Safe Key
9802.description: This key, crafted by Blacksmith Noel, should be given to Warehouse Chief Mona.

9803.name: Sealed Document
9803.description: This document was sent by Kaitnat to the Hierarch Casca.

9804.name: Wyrm Heart
9804.description: This is the heart of the Wyrm that Kekropus requested.

9805.name: Kekropus' Recommendation
9805.description: This letter of recommendation written by Kekropus should be shown to Bitus in Giran.

9806.name: Soul Breaker Certificate
9806.description: Show this Soul Breaker Certificate to a nearby Grand Master and you can become a Soul Breaker.

9807.name: Wolf Tail
9807.description: Perwan has requested this wolf tail for the Rite of Warriors.

9808.name: Muertos Claw
9808.description: Collect 10 of these sharp Muertos claws and take them to Kekropus.

9809.name: Grey Keltir Tooth
9809.description: Marksman Bixon will pay well for this Grey Keltir Tooth.

9810.name: Black Wolf Tooth
9810.description: Marksman Bixon will pay well for this tooth of a Black Wolf.

9811.name: Fortress Certificate
9811.description: Use this to trade for supplies with a Detention Camp Warden.

9812.name: Castle Certificate
9812.description: Use this to trade for supplies with a Prison Warden.

9814.name: Memento Mori
9814.description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

9815.name: Dragon Heart
9815.description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

9816.name: Earth Egg
9816.description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

9817.name: Nonliving Nucleus
9817.description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

9818.name: Angelic Essence
9818.description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

9819.name: Combat flag
9819.description: Put this into the flagpole to win Fortress War. You are forced to wear it once you acquire it, during which time use of Attack and Attack Skills is impossible, but Flag Display Skills can be used. Flag Display

9820.name: Shadow Item: Clan Oath Helm
9820.description: This Shadow Item contains the mirrored power of a Clan Oath Helm. It cannot be traded, dropped, crystallized, or given other functions.

9821.name: Shadow Item: Clan Oath Armor
9821.description: This Shadow Item contains the mirrored power of a Clan Oath Armor. It cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or given other functions. Full body armor. It can only be used by one belonging to the Academy or its graduates.

9822.name: Shadow Item: Clan Oath Gauntlets - Heavy Armor
9822.description: This Shadow Item contains the mirrored power of Clan Oath Gauntlets. It cannot be traded, dropped, crystallized, or given other functions.

9823.name: Shadow Item: Clan Oath Sabaton - Heavy Armor
9823.description: This Shadow Item contains the mirrored power of Clan Oath Sabaton. It cannot be traded, dropped, crystallized, or given other functions.

9824.name: Shadow Item: Clan Oath Brigandine
9824.description: This Shadow Item contains the mirrored power of Clan Oath Brigandine. It cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or given other functions. Full body armor. It can only be used by one belonging to the Academy or its graduates.

9825.name: Shadow Item: Clan Oath Leather Gloves - Light Armor

9826.name: Shadow Item: Clan Oath Boots - Light Armor

9827.name: Shadow Item: Clan Oath Aketon
9827.description: This Shadow Item contains the mirrored power of Clan Oath Aketon. It cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or given other functions. Full body armor. It can only be used by one belonging to the Academy or its graduates.

9828.description: This Shadow Item contains the mirrored power of Clan Oath Padded Gloves. It cannot be traded, dropped, crystallized, or given other functions.

9829.name: Shadow Item: Clan Oath Sandals - Robe
9829.description: This Shadow Item contains the mirrored power of Clan Oath Sandals. It cannot be traded, dropped, crystallized, or given other functions.

9830.name: Improved Apella Helm
9830.description: Can be worn by a Baron or higher-level Aristocrat.

9831.name: Improved Apella Plate Armor
9831.description: This full body armor used by clan members can be worn by a Baron or higher-level Aristocrat.

9832.name: Improved Apella Gauntlet - Heavy Armor
9832.description: Can be worn by a Baron or a higher-level Aristocrat.

9833.name: Improved Apella Solleret - Heavy Armor
9833.description: Can be worn by a Baron or a higher-level Aristocrat.

9834.name: Improved Apella Brigandine
9834.description: Can be worn by a Baron or a higher-level Aristocrat.

9835.name: Improved Apella Leather Gloves - Light Armor
9835.description: Can be worn by a Baron or a higher-level Aristocrat.

9836.name: Improved Apella Boots - Light Armor
9836.description: Can be worn by a Baron or a higher-level Aristocrat.

9837.name: Improved Apella Doublet
9837.description: This full body armor used by clan members can be worn by a Baron or higher-level Aristocrat.

9838.name: Improved Apella Silk Gloves - Robe
9838.description: Can be worn by a Baron or higher-level Aristocrat.

9839.name: Improved Apella Sandals - Robe
9839.description: Can be worn by a Baron or higher-level Aristocrat.

9840.name: Shadow Item: Chevalier Rapier
9840.description: This Shadow Item has the power of a Chevalier Rapier. It cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized or possess additional functions.

9841.name: Shadow Item: Riter Schlager
9841.description: This Shadow Item has the power of a Riter Schlager. It cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized or possess additional functions.

9848.name: Shadow Item: Peacemaker
9848.description: This Shadow Item has the power of a Peacemaker. It cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized or possess additional functions.

9850.name: Basic Caravan Certificate
9850.description: A certificate of friendship with Caravans.

9851.name: Standard Caravan Certificate
9851.description: A certificate of business relations with Caravans.

9852.name: Premium Caravan Certificate
9852.description: A certificate indicating a unique friendship with Caravans.

9853.name: Mark of Friendship and Trust
9853.description: A mark to show the highest grade of relationship Caravans.

9854.name: Dynasty Sword - Focus
9854.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 111. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

9855.name: Dynasty Sword - Health
9855.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

9856.name: Dynasty Sword - Light
9856.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

9857.name: Dynasty Blade - Focus
9857.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 111. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

9858.name: Dynasty Blade - Health
9858.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

9859.name: Dynasty Blade - Light
9859.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

9860.name: Dynasty Phantom - Acumen
9860.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

9861.name: Dynasty Phantom - Mana Up
9861.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

9862.name: Dynasty Phantom - Conversion
9862.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Conversion

9863.name: Dynasty Bow - Cheap Shot
9863.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases MP Consumption 4% during a skill attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

9864.name: Dynasty Bow - Guidance
9864.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Accuracy by 5.32. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Guidance

9865.name: Dynasty Bow - Focus
9865.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 116. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

9866.name: Dynasty Knife - Focus
9866.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 116. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

9867.name: Dynasty Knife - Evasion
9867.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Evasion by 5. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Evasion

9868.name: Dynasty Knife - Critical Damage
9868.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases P. Atk. by 559 on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Critical Damage

9869.name: Dynasty Halberd - Anger
9869.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases your HP by 15% and increases P. Atk. by 78. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Anger

9870.name: Dynasty Halberd - Critical Stun
9870.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. There is a 48% chance that Stun effect is applied on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

9871.name: Dynasty Halberd - Light
9871.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

9872.name: Dynasty Cudgel - Anger
9872.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases your HP by 15% and increases P. Atk. by 78. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Anger

9873.name: Dynasty Cudgel - Health
9873.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

9874.name: Dynasty Cudgel - Rsk. Focus
9874.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 164 when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Rsk. Focus

9875.name: Dynasty Mace - Mana Up
9875.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

9876.name: Dynasty Mace - Conversion
9876.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Conversion

9877.name: Dynasty Mace - Acumen
9877.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

9878.name: Dynasty Bagh-Nakh - Rsk. Evasion
9878.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Evasion by 6.8 when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Rsk. Evasion

9879.name: Dynasty Bagh-Nakh - Focus
9879.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases critical attack by 106. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

9880.name: Dynasty Bagh-Nakh - Haste
9880.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by 10%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

9881.name: Diploma
9881.description: Take this Diploma to Second Hierarch Perwan.

9882.name: Great Wolf Necklace
9882.description: A necklace used to summon Great Wolf. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns. Wolf's Necklace

9883.name: Teddy Bear Hat - Big Head
9883.description: This fun, bear-shaped hair accessory makes your head bigger while allowing you to use active skills. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Mysterious Effect

9884.name: Piggy Hat - Big Head
9884.description: This fun, pig-shaped hair accessory makes your head bigger while allowing you to use active skills. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Mysterious Effect

9885.name: Jester Hat - Big Head
9885.description: This festive, split-top jester hat makes your head bigger while allowing you to use active skills. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Mysterious Effect

9886.name: Wizard Hat - Big Head
9886.description: This Wizard Hat features a wide brim and bent tip and makes your head bigger while allowing you to use active skills. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Mysterious Effect

9887.name: Dapper Cap - Big Head
9887.description: This stylish cap features a visor and makes your head bigger while allowing you to use active skills. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Mysterious Effect

9888.name: Romantic Chapeau - Big Head
9888.description: This extravagant chapeau is adorned with feathers and makes your head bigger while allowing you to use active skills. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Mysterious Effect

9889.name: Iron Circlet - Big Head
9889.description: An iron circlet that makes your head bigger while allowing you to use active skills. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Mysterious Effect

9890.name: Teddy Bear Hat - Firework
9890.description: A fun, bear-shaped hair accessory. You can use active skills, and firecrackers are set off when it is used. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Large Firecracker Effect

9891.name: Piggy Hat - Firework
9891.description: A fun, pig-shaped hair accessory. You can use active skills, and firecrackers are set off when it is used. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Large Firecracker Effect

9892.name: Jester Hat - Firework
9892.description: A festive jester hat with a split top. You can use active skills, and firecrackers are set off when it is used. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Large Firecracker Effect

9893.name: Wizard Hat - Firework
9893.description: A Wizard Hat with a wide brim and bent tip. You can use active skills, and firecrackers are set off when it is used. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Large Firecracker Effect

9894.name: Dapper Cap - Firework
9894.description: A stylish cap with a visor. You can use active skills, and firecrackers are set off when it is used. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Large Firecracker Effect

9895.name: Romantic Chapeau - Firework
9895.description: An extravagant chapeau adorned with feathers. You can use active skills, and firecrackers are set off when it is used. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Large Firecracker Effect

9896.name: Iron Circlet - Firework
9896.description: A circlet made of iron. You can use active skills, and firecrackers are set off when it is used. Requires 2 hair accessory slots. Large Firecracker Effect

9897.name: Scroll of Transformation - Pig
9897.description: Scroll of Transformation that transforms you into a pig for 60 minutes. It will have no effect if used while in a transformed state. Scroll of Transformation - Pig

9898.name: SP Scroll: Highest Grade
9898.description: A scroll that can load 500,000 SP. Scroll of SP

9899.name: Weight Loss Ring
9899.description: Decreases weight when equipped. Effect does not stack with additional Weight Loss Rings. Weight Decrease Ring
